pytealutils.storage package

Submodules

class pytealutils.storage.global_blob.GlobalBlob

Bases: object

Blob is a class holding static methods to work with the global storage of an application as a binary large object

The zero method must be called on an application on opt in and the schema of the global storage should be 16 bytes

Get a single byte from global storage of an application by index

read bytes between bstart and bend from global storage of an application by index

static set_byte(idx: <TealType.uint64: 0>, byte: <TealType.uint64: 0>)

Set a single byte from global storage of an application by index

static write(bstart: <TealType.uint64: 0>, buff: <TealType.bytes: 1>) → pyteal.Expr

write bytes between bstart and len(buff) to global storage of an application

static zero() → pyteal.Expr

initializes global state of an application to all zero bytes

This allows us to be lazy later and _assume_ all the strings are the same size

class pytealutils.storage.local_blob.LocalBlob

Bases: object

Blob is a class holding static methods to work with the local storage of an account as a binary large object

The zero method must be called on an account on opt in and the schema of the local storage should be 16 bytes

__dict__ = mappingproxy({'__module__': 'pytealutils.storage.local_blob', '__doc__': '\n    Blob is a class holding static methods to work with the local storage of an account as a binary large object\n\n    The `zero` method must be called on an account on opt in and the schema of the local storage should be 16 bytes\n    ', 'zero': <staticmethod object>, 'get_byte': <staticmethod object>, 'set_byte': <staticmethod object>, 'read': <staticmethod object>, 'write': <staticmethod object>, '__dict__': <attribute '__dict__' of 'LocalBlob' objects>, '__weakref__': <attribute '__weakref__' of 'LocalBlob' objects>, '__annotations__': {}})
